Prime Video Enhancer

Customize your Amazon Prime Video viewing experience with Prime Video Enhancer. This extension gives you control over the Prime Video interface, allowing you to focus on what matters most - the content you're watching.

Key Features:

1. Disable X-Ray: Hide the floating bar that shows cast and scene information, giving you an unobstructed view of the video.

2. Disable Overlay: Remove the overlay that appears when controls are active, providing a cleaner viewing experience.

3. Hide Center Controls: Conceal the center player controls (rewind, play/pause, forward) for a more immersive viewing session.

4. Hide Title: Remove the title of the show or movie from the player interface for a cleaner look.

5. Hide Subtitle: Eliminate the subtitle or episode name display for an even more streamlined viewing experience.

6. Easy Toggle: Quickly enable or disable features with simple, intuitive toggles.

7. Non-Intrusive: The extension only activates on Prime Video pages, ensuring it doesn't interfere with your browsing on other sites.

How It Works:

Once installed, simply click on the extension icon when you're on a Prime Video page. You'll see options to customize your viewing experience. Toggle the features you want, and refresh your Prime Video page to see the changes take effect.

Privacy-Focused:

Prime Video Enhancer respects your privacy. It doesn't collect any personal information, doesn't track your browsing history, and doesn't access any of your Amazon account details. Your settings are stored locally on your device and are never shared.

Perfect For:

- Binge-watchers who want a cleaner, more immersive viewing experience
- Users who find the X-Ray feature, titles, or subtitles distracting
- Anyone looking to customize their Prime Video interface for a more personalized viewing experience

Enhance your Prime Video experience today with Prime Video Enhancer!
